entry.title: Amazon Prime Video - Buy Movie UX
entry.summary: #FeatureRequest #lessdistraction - Family rented a movie on Amazon Primevideo TV app on Friday. Request came to me as the resident techsupport - the flow is complex like below. On iOS, this flow is like the movie Inception when it jumps between UPI app and browser. A regular UPI payment by scanning QR code on TV would have been nice. Perhaps a quick fix is to open Amazon app from Scan QR to remove login + OTP steps. …
